name: The Forgotten Ruins
description:
You and your friend have found your way into a deep dark ruin of an ancient civilisation. Your friend needs your help with building courage in going through these ruins, and will place You in the seat of helping the NPC to solve each puzzle put before you rather than the other way around as it usually is. The inspiration was to reverse the roles of you being a supporting character to the main character. It is currently in development and acts as a visual tech demo. It also requires Alt+F4 to turn it off.

CREDITS:
